text: Selena Gomez and The Weeknd's ( whose real name is Abel Tesfaye ) breakup was reported today after nearly 10 months of dating. Theirs was a relationship of worldwide PDA, sweet Instagram stories about the other, and so much more. Here, a look back from start to finish. January 2017 : Selena Gomez and The Weeknd are photographed making out just two months after he broke up with Bella Hadid. Advertisement - Continue Reading Below The two start following each other on Instagram, then go on vacation to Italy together ( Florence and Venice specifically ). There, The Weeknd puts the first shot of Gomez in his Instagram story : Instagram And Gomez puts a video of The Weeknd on her'gram, though she deletes it hours later.
